package.name: jsx3.ide
package.text: The public API of the General Interface IDE. This package is only available when running in the IDE.

field.name: SERVER
field.text: The server instance corresponding to the application opened in the IDE.

method.name: getActiveServer
method.text: Returns the server instance corresponding to the currently active component editor tab. If no tab is open or the active tab is not a component editor, this method returns null.

method.name: getSelected
method.text: Returns the collection of DOM objects currently selected in the Component Hierarchy palette. Returns an empty array if that palette is closed.

method.name: loadTemplateCatalog

param.name: strPath
param.text: the path to the catalog file.

param.name: objResolver
param.text: the object against which to resolve URIs contained in the catalog file.

method.text: Loads a template catalog for the Properties Editor, Events Editor, or XSL Parameters palettes.

method.name: registerTemplateForClass

param.name: strPath
param.text: the resolved path to the template file, or a function with signature function(objJSX : jsx3.app.Model) : jsx3.xml.Document

method.text: Registers a template for a particular class in the Properties Editor, Events Editor, or XSL Parameters palettes.
